name: Crumbs (DJ Mix)
description:
Crumbs is a game developed at Azusa Pacific University by Zachary Gomez and Dawson-Jay Mix. 

Your Cat, Bread, has wandered off! Can you follow his trail and get him home safely?

Controls: 

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • W A S D - Move
  • X - Interact
  • Z - Undo action
  • R  - Restart Level

Credits:

  • Developed By:
  • Zachary Gomez https://tokomoto.itch.io/
  • Dawson-Jay Mix https://dj-mix.itch.io/
  • Title -  Brooklyn Vander Wel
  • Cover/Banner Art - Rebecca Zheng
  • Playtesters - Christian Peterson, Isaac Diaz, Aiyana Chex, Braden Robins
